1000000011111010 1001000101000111 1 -> sum: 0001001001000010, cout: 1
0110010011010100 0011111000000111 0 -> sum: 1010001011011011, cout: 0
0111001111111111 0100010110101101 0 -> sum: 1011100110101100, cout: 0
0110101010110101 0001000011110101 0 -> sum: 0111101110101010, cout: 0
1100110100100101 0000010010101011 1 -> sum: 1101000111010001, cout: 0
1011100001100111 0111010011001101 0 -> sum: 0010110100110100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
